remarks: The LUB of a complete lattice subset is the least bound.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-2011.)
statement:
lublem.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lublem.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lublem.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
lubl $p |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ S C_ B /\ X e. B ) -> ( A. y e. S y .<_ X -> ( U ` S ) .<_ X ) ) $.
$d .<_ y $.
$d K y $.
$d S y $.
$d U y $.
$d X y $.
